# Copilot Agent Instructions

This directory contains instructions and guidance for GitHub Copilot Agent Mode to assist with various aspects of the APEX to .NET migration project.

## Available Agent Instructions

### apex-to-dotnet-migration-guide.md
Comprehensive guide for migrating Oracle APEX applications to Angular/.NET architecture.

**Use this guide when:**
- Planning APEX to .NET migration strategy
- Creating workflow inventories
- Extracting business logic from PL/SQL
- Designing .NET API architecture
- Building Angular frontend components
- Setting up testing and validation
- Planning cutover and coexistence strategies

**Key principles:**
- Workflow-first approach (not page-by-page)
- Strangler Fig incremental migration pattern
- Clean architecture with clear seams
- Behavioral parity testing
- Phased delivery approach

## How to Use

These instructions are designed to be consumed by GitHub Copilot Agent Mode. When working on APEX migration tasks, agents will reference these guides to:

1. Follow established patterns and best practices
2. Make consistent architectural decisions
3. Generate code that aligns with migration strategy
4. Validate approaches against proven patterns
5. Maintain quality and consistency across the migration

## Contributing

When adding new agent instructions:
- Use clear, structured markdown
- Include practical examples
- Reference internal learnings and case studies
- Provide specific, actionable guidance
- Include validation and testing approaches
